name: Wicked Hot Chipotle Chile Pequin Salsa
description: This fiery salsa gets heat from the Chile Pequins and a rich flavor from the Chipotles in Adobo.

recipeInstructions.text: Roast the tomatoes in the oven at 400F for 15-20 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Roast the tomatoes in the oven at 400F for 15-20 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Pick through 1/8 cup of Chile Pequins (25-30 chilis) and remove any stems or hardened chilis
recipeInstructions.name: Pick through 1/8 cup of Chile Pequins (25-30 chilis) and remove any stems or hardened chilis

recipeInstructions.text: Add the Chile Pequins to the roasting pan and roast for 1-2 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Add the Chile Pequins to the roasting pan and roast for 1-2 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomatoes and Chile Pequins to a blender along with 3 chipotles in adobo, a sliver of onion, 2 garlic cloves, a pinch of salt, 2-3 tablespoons of water, and a splash of vinegar.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tomatoes and Chile Pequins to a blender along with 3 chipotles in adobo, a sliver of onion, 2 garlic cloves, a pinch of salt, 2-3 tablespoons of water, and a splash of vinegar.

recipeInstructions.text: Pulse blend until ingredients thoroughly combined
recipeInstructions.name: Pulse blend until ingredients thoroughly combined
